description:
Packing your own first aide kit is the best way to get exactly what you want. This First Aid dry sack from Sea to Summit has lots of room for everything you might need, and its bright red material makes it easy to find when you need it most. With a roll-top design and sealed seams, this bag keeps your medical supplies dry in any weather.

  • High-visibility red fabric printed with the international standard for first aid kits (ISO 7010)
  • Roll-top design keeps your first aid gear dry
  • Non-wicking closure strip draws moisture away from the bag
  • Rugged 70D nylon is fully seam-sealed
  • Clear window lets you quickly index contents
  • White interior makes it easy to find what you need
  • Oval base makes packing easy
  • 3L size is great for making overnight kits
name: Sea To Summit First Aid Dry Sack - Overnight - 3L
